title: Commission Decision of 30 December 1988 amending Decision 86/477/EEC approving an integrated Mediterranean programme for Crete (Greece)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 December 1988
amending Decision 86/477/EEC approving an integrated Mediterranean programme for Crete (Greece)
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(89/39/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Decision 86/477/EEC the text of Article is hereby replaced by the following:
'The contribution from the special budget heading referred to in Article 11 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2088/85 shall not exceed ECU 103 641 000 in respect of the expenditure to be incurred in the period from 13 November 1985 to 12 November 1992 on measures to be financed in the context of the IMP for Crete, for which the total Community assistance from budgetary funds is estimated at ECU 245 243 000.'
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 December 1988.
For the Commission
Grigoris VARFIS
Member of the Commission

(2) OJ No L 282, 3. 10. 1986, p. 21.
(3) OJ No C 35, 13. 2. 1987, p. 2.
